title: Delta SkyMiles changes ruffle some fliers’ feathers
text: Delta SkyMiles changes ruffle some fliers’ feathers Jul 16, 2015, 12:08pm EDT Share Davia Anderson Delta Air Lines Inc. (NYSE: DAL) is apparently moving goalpost again with its SkyMiles rewards program. Mashable reports the Atlanta-based carrier has abandoned an easy-to-understand awards chart and made rewards points “correlate more to the value — as in retail price — of awarded flights and upgrades.” And elite frequent fliers can no longer get free upgrades.
